title: Pharmacy Education Program for Enhancing Clinical Reasoning Skills Using Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Short-term course for adults over 40 to strengthen medication management and patient care competencies through VR-based clinical scenario experiences

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various clinical scenarios presented in a VR environment and select appropriate medications for patient symptoms.
Learners can apply three or more communication strategies to improve medication adherence through interactions with virtual patients.
Learners can perform procedures for managing drug interactions and side effects with an accuracy rate of 80% or higher through VR simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
